"Alright, I'm here.": "Crawford had it prepared for me, in case I need to go into battle."
"When Zephetto was manipulating you like that, what did it feel like?"

"Rather than feeling \"manipulated\",
it felt like my mind had been separated from my body."
"As if I was looking at another \"me\", so to speak..."
"Why did Zephetto choose Faria to be the one to relay his message?"
"But I'm also Zephetto's backup, it seems."

"When Zephetto's consciousness flowed into me,
so too did the knowledge that I am his backup."
"So it's like a precautionary measure in case something happens to him..."
"Faria, if something's the matter, let us know right away."
"Thank you very much... for worrying about me."
